Tyrael: I thought so. After all, you are a part of Megatron. In that 
case, I suggest a truce. We both want the death of the Maximals and 
if we manage to meld our mutual strengths, we could deal a deadly 
blow. However, the matter of your arrest will only be delayed to a 
more proper time.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras::
> 
> "What if I decide remain????"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael: I was wishing that you would agree to go in exile by 
> > yourself... However, since I was suggesting this, I assume I am 
> the 
> > negotiator. I would allow you to stay in contact with your 
troops, 
> > but your physical presence would be denied.
> >

> > >
